data.title: Harrison Lough - 2024 - Baseball
data.meta_description:
Harrison Lough (3) RHP  - SOPHOMORE YEAR (2023)
Started eight games on the mound, made three relief appearances... Struck out 31 batters... Threw 3.1 shutout innings
data.text:
SOPHOMORE YEAR (2023)

Started eight games on the mound, made three relief appearances... Struck out 31 batters... Threw 3.1 shutout innings on 4/16 against Lock Haven... Struck out a season-high five batters on 4/3 against Lincoln and 5/7 against Staten Island

FRESHMAN YEAR (2022)

Started eight games on the mound, made three relief appearances... Struck out 36 batters... Pitched three innings of shut out ball in collegiate debut on 2/26 against Penn State-Greater Allegheny... Struck out a career-high seven batters in 5.2 innings on 4/23 against Lincoln

HIGH SCHOOL CAREER

Membered three seasons with the North Shore City Baseball club and played one season on the New Zealand U18 National Team in 2020. At the Menâ€™s Premier Nationals, the Auckland, New Zealand native never surrendered an earned run in 9.1 innings pitched.

PERSONAL

Son of Adam and Kara Lough and has one sister, Marina ... Majoring in exercise and sport management.
